lines.text: Throughout the world... strange events transpire.
If I hear nothing within 48 hours, in the 49th hour your husband will find out just where his wife spends her Tuesday and Friday evenings...
The day after tomorrow, you will deliver the data in writing to the owner of the opium den you know so well, and in exchange you will get the negative...
How far have you gotten with Jellusic?
I've got him eating out of my hand! And for a kiss he'd sell me all fortresses and the entire army of his country!
A gentleman does not betray his lady!
Nothing is to deter a man from the path of duty... not even a woman...
I'll have this man watched by one of our agents as soon as he arrives.
A plane leaves in 45 minutes that will arrive down there two hours after the Orient Express.
Whose blood am I to wear around my neck, Haghi?
I have other irons in the fire...
Please, let me stay here! Don't send me away again! I won't take up any more space than a little dog - !
Almighty God - what power is at play here?
Attention - Central - Central - Central - ! Attention - Central - Central - Central - ! Attention - Central - Central - Central - ! No. 326 is alive - !
People's lives - in danger - ! The bank must be searched within 13 minutes, and Haghi's secret room found - do you understand? -...
